docs.lead_paragraph: THE past week, with its Horse and Gown Show, proved as usual that the equine event is interesting sartorially, for many of the newest and smartest morning walking gowns were seen at the early sessions, and during the afternoon handsome velvet and cloth reception and walking costumes were in evidence.
